name: Orbital Snap
description:
Orbital Snap, a game about orbits. A heartfelt story about a lonely alien satellite named Sal (because story) trying to find his alien friends at well known landmarks across the face of the earth.

Use the controls to alter your orbit and take pictures of each landmark. Before you run out of fuel. Turning uses up fuel.

Keyboard:

-A&D: Move left and right control orbital tilt

-Right Click: Zoom In

-Left Click: Take Picture (can only do when zoomed in)

For windows only
